title: HEALTH SYSTEM
description: You don't just have a health bar. You have body parts.
stats: Head/Thorax: If these reach 0 from damage (not bleeding), you die instantly.
Legs/Arms: If 0 (blacked), you can't run or aim steady. Taking damage to blacked limbs spreads damage to the rest of the body.
Medication: Bandages for bleeds. Splints for fractures. Surgery kits to repair blacked limbs.

title: AMMO & BALLISTICS
description: The gun matters less than the bullet.
stats: Penetration: Higher pen pierces armor. High flesh damage is blocked by armor but destroys limbs.
Armor Classes: Rated 1-6. Class 4 is the mid-game standard. Class 6 is elite.
Tip: An expensive gun with bad ammo is useless against armored targets.

title: SOUND & AWARENESS
stats: Headsets: In-game headsets compress loud noises (guns) and amplify quiet ones (footsteps). Always wear one.
Weight: Being overweight makes you louder and draius stamina faster.
Surface: Metal and glass are loud. Grass is quieter.
